description: Lists the applications associated with a specific Amazon Web Services account. You can provide the unique identifier of a specific runtime environment in a query parameter to see all applications associated with that environment.

nested_items.name: applications
nested_items.description: Returns a list of summary details for all the applications in a runtime environment.

nested_items.name: applicationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the application.

nested_items.name: applicationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the application.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the application was created.

nested_items.name: deploymentStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates either an ongoing deployment or if the application has ever deployed successfully.

nested_items.name: engineType
nested_items.description: The type of the target platform for this application.

nested_items.name: environmentId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the runtime environment that hosts this application.

nested_items.name: lastStartTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when you last started the application. Null until the application runs for the first time.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role associated with the application.

nested_items.name: versionStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates the status of the latest version of the application.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A pagination token that's returned when the response doesn't contain all applications.
